fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: the enabled flag. Specifies whether automatic scaling is enabled for the resource. The default value is 'false'.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: the name of the autoscale setting.

fields.name: Profiles
fields.description: the collection of automatic scaling profiles that specify different scaling parameters for different time periods. A maximum of 20 profiles can be specified.

fields.name: TargetResourceLocation
fields.description: the location of the resource that the autoscale setting should be added to.

fields.name: TargetResourceUri
fields.description: the resource identifier of the resource that the autoscale setting should be added to.
